Posts.Content: dannabenne wrote: Hi--in January I noticed a hard pea like lump in my left breast.  I had a core needle biopsy done that came back benign.  Now, I feel another lump like the first near the original lump and possibly a soft mushy lump near it.  I am due to start my period soon but am wondering if I should call and have this looked at... Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: A new lump? dannabenne artsci1
